creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: plate with shallow, upturned edges on small foot; decorated with bands of diagonal spots, floral motifs, and starbursts inside in white and gray colors; large band of spots on outside with reed-like motif around mouth
medium: Stoneware with inlaid porcelain under pine ash glaze
title: Mishima style plate [tentative]
